Allows an application to add shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows an application to remove shortcuts without user intervention.
Allows an application to read the settings and shortcuts in Home.
Allows an application to change the settings and shortcuts in Home.
This is a system application and cannot be uninstalled.
You can put your favorite apps here.
To see all your apps, touch the circle.
To add an app to your home screen, touch & hold it.
To move an app, touch & hold it.
To make a new folder on your home screen, stack one app on top of another.
